sqlcursors module¶

class sqlcursors.SQLcursor(**kwargs)¶

Bases: object

Abstract Base Class, or mostly an interface. Inherit from this and define a DBconect() method that sets _conn and _cursor.

class sqlcursors.SQLiteCursor(**kwargs)¶

Bases: sqlcursors.SQLcursor

DBconnect()¶
DELETE(table, where, values)¶

Values are a COMPLETE tuple following ordered schema

INSERT(table, values)¶

Values are a COMPLETE tuple following ordered schema

UPDATE(table, setclause, values)¶

setclause is effective key=val, key=val sequence
